caption: Best customer expirence I had the last years. I contacted Church's to get the buckle of my belt changed because it was scrateched. A few days after my request the team from the Chruch's boutique called me (and also wrote me an e-mail) to arrange everything. They kept my updated of everey single step. Many thanks to Fatima and the rest of the team. After six weeks I received my belt with a new buckle and it was free of charge in this case. If you need some excelent shoes or a nice belt visit this store. Thank you
Small selection of women's shoes. We took a quick look but no one greeted us
Lovely staff and great quality shoes! Historical Maison
Excellent service, thorough advice from style to fit
It was a store I wanted to go back to and purchase from, thanks to the staff who were very polite and faithfully responded to every moment. They are the ones who create Church's brand identity.
Excellent saleswoman. Quick sale and great satisfaction. Very satisfied with the acquisition. Took a size larger. Very comfortable shoes. Excellent leather.

Fatima is the very idea of ‚Äã‚Äãthe saleswoman that every customer - a little passionate about the beauty of leather and artisanal materials - is looking for. Her advice is precious and prudent, she adapts to the material of the shoe to make it beautiful. Thanks to her and her young, pleasant colleague!
I recommend Chlo√© who is professional and friendly. Ella gave me great advice on choosing from the collection. Warm welcome and very good quality shoes. üëç ‚Ä¶
The store clerk Chlo√© is kind and professional ‚ù§Ô∏è I bought some beautiful wedding shoes here üòç ‚Ä¶

A Church customer for many years, I have been wandering around the Church Galaries Lafayettes Haussmann corner for weeks from whom I request invoices for shoes that I purchased in 2019! I am disappointed that a brand of this reputation does not provide customer service that matches its image and the quality of its shoes!

Amazing thank you Fatima  Really passionate and so pleasant saleswoman.  I hope the management they have a nugget I wanted to make this comment because I had hesitated for a long time about the Shannons that she sold me and she managed to convince me and still without regrets after 10 months

Very poor welcome, barely a hello, no smile, a saleswoman who doesn't know the names of the models (Gratton anyway!) or the colors! And yet there are so few references to know at Chrurch‚Äôs!!!! Customer service becomes magical when I am told that for a pair of shoes costing 1070 euros, we have 14 days to exchange it if the size turns out to be the wrong one!!! Literally unacceptable. Message for management: control the level and know-how of your sales teams!

To my great surprise, the Church's store refused to take my derbies for factory resoling. It was for this service, now reserved for men (incredible!) which made my shoes eternal, that I was faithful to Church's. And that more than made up for the initial discomfort until the shoes ‚Äúmade themselves‚Äù. In a time of parity and sustainable development, this is unacceptable and completely against the grain.

A saleswoman who did her job very well, but a very rude young salesman who bluntly asked my old mother to get up because she was not trying on shoes, even though we bought the most expensive pair of shoes in the world. store. Pair which by the way, unlike on the internet, does not offer a personalized box nor the shoe polish kit. With hindsight we regret these 1700 euros a little. It is deplorable that this charming saleswoman has such unpleasant colleagues.

My experience at the Saint Honor√© boutique was very satisfactory. I thank Chlo√© for her welcome and support. I would also like to warmly thank Fatima for all the advice given regarding the maintenance of the shoe, also I thank you for the on-site maintenance of my pair that I had with me. It came out of the store like new
Excellent welcome, attentive, very professional

****** after-sales service I bought RHONDA sandals - after 2 months of use they came off (see photos) - I took them to a shoemaker! What a mistake! So Churchs does not want to take them in after-sales service - I will never buy a pair from you again! It's a shame. This brand is no longer as prestigious with more than mediocre quality.

I visited on my way home from shopping as it was close to my hotel. If you're looking for a standard item, you can buy it for about half the price in Japan, so it's highly recommended. The male clerk who helped me was very kind and even though I had a lot of luggage, he asked, ``Are you okay? Can you carry it?'' Also fluent in English. Although it's not a French brand, it was a nice memory to be able to shop in a streetside store in a relaxed manner.

Extra sellers!!!! Some shoes are beautiful!! And high quality!! Too bad it's too expensive.  Recently the prices have become unaffordable and nothing justifies such an increase, especially on the same item.

I do not in any way recommend the Church store on rue Saint Honor√© or the after-sales service is unspeakably bad and deplorably inefficient. We bought a pair of Chelsea boots in this store and returned them for a heel defect that came off after a few weeks of use, as well as an elastic band that became loose. The repair work that was done more than made the visual appearance of the model worse. After returning to this store again to explain our dissatisfaction and request an exchange we, on the one hand, were very poorly received and on the other hand, had the great surprise to learn that if the problem was "only visual ¬ª no action could be done for us. At ‚Ç¨650 a pair, how is it possible that a person representing your brand can give this type of speech? How can the visual aspect of a luxury product like yours be so little considered? Your customers pay as much for the impeccable quality of your products as for their ‚Äúdefect-free‚Äù aesthetics, style and visual appearance. THANKS

My visit to the boutique on rue Saint Honor√© took place on Friday, November 16, 2018. In the boutique, 2 advisors and 1 salesperson. As soon as I arrived, I immediately felt the salesman's denigrating gaze. Of course, I didn't have a pair of shoes on my feet, just a pair of casual sneakers. However, I didn't think my outfit would earn me this bad experience. Clothes don't make a monk, remember what you're looking for. In the store, I asked the seller if he had the Oxford Tricolor model in blue, and he replied word for word "yes, we have it". I asked him if it was only on order because I didn't see it in stores; immediately the seller replied ‚Äúwe have it in store, the pair is upstairs in stock‚Äù. INCREDIBLE, the seller doesn't even ask me to see it. After telling me that they had the pair in stock, he said to me "I'll let you enjoy it". All this because... I wasn't dressed "properly" but know that my pair of sneakers are worth more than most of the shoes on sale in the store. That evening I was hesitating between a Berluti and a Church's. Result, thanks to an unpleasant, unfriendly welcome at Church"s, I immediately went to get a pair from Berluti. Thanks again to the seller for this denigrating welcome, don't forget that the suit does not make the monk and that 'at the end of the month it's not me who has a salesman's salary...

I agree with the opinion of Mr. Nicolas Fereira, the quality of the welcome and the service completely follows the customer's mind... How can a brand of this name still think that a "poorly dressed" customer cannot get a product from their home? I hope the parent company will have heard customer reviews of this store.
Perfectly located store. Pleasant and adapted welcome. The salespeople are very competent and friendly. As for shoes, one of the last bootmakers still working traditionally...

A real torture. I haven't had this bad of feet in 20 years. The leather is extremely hard. The seller assured me that the size and width were perfect (this is exactly the size I bought from Church 15 years ago without ever having a problem). I tried to soften them with Shoe Eze and then wore them for several hours at home. Then I wanted to try them on the street for 800 meters. It bruised my feet to the point where I haven't been able to wear shoes for 24 hours. I left the shoe trees open as wide as possible overnight. It didn't do anything. Thanks Church. Something has really changed since 2003.
Superb store, a warm and wonderful welcome from the saleswoman Fatima, she is very attentive to our requests and manages to find solutions. I highly recommend it
Null!! The shoes are nice but the staff is arrogant and not present. I do not recommend
Warm welcome!  Professional seller with good advice, who was able to support me all the way. I recommend
Thanks to Audrey and Michel for their very friendly and generous welcome. Quality of service and products are there.
Excellent team, thank you very much for having so well "restored" my favorite pair of shoes which will last for years.
Great Service and very caring staff! THANKS !
Excellent service, nice shoes.
Nice shop with choice and good advice.
very warm welcome, the advisors were available and the shoes were superb
Very user friendly website. Very nice range of shoes
Very welcoming staff, providing all the necessary advice and taking the time to explain
An incredibly caring salesperson who makes all the difference
Alright
Horrible reception, if you are not ‚Äúwell‚Äù dressed, you are not well received.
